text.font-family: ui-monospace, SFMono-Regular, Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, 'Liberation Mono', 'Courier New', monospace
ui-monospace, SFMono-Regular, Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, 'Liberation Mono', 'Courier New', monospace

svg.text: apiVersion: kyverno.io/v1 kind: ClusterPolicy metadata: name: disallow-privileged-containers spec: validationFailureAction: audit background: true rules: - name: privileged-containers match: resources: kinds: [Pod] validate: message: "Privileged containers are not allowed" pattern: spec: containers: - =(securityContext): =(privileged): false
